title: Find the shortest distance between two lines in Unity (Code in description) (Bad code)
description:
Edit: This code is not good enough and is not well design. I have a better code now but did not published it. I let's the video online in case it can help someone.  
---------------------
Hello, I realized how hard, and not document, this simple computation of finding the shortest line of two lines in 3D is. So here is a way that is not the best or the more clear ever but at least it is a start point if you need to do it.

Gist code:
https://gist.github.com/EloiStree/033d59e2dbaa7801644c9a03d95eb266

Hope the code help you. 
May the code be with you.
author: Éloi Strée, ꬲ🧰: Raw video
